title: South Africa: Let's Celebrate Our African Pride, Diversity and Culture On Heritage Day!
text:
Angola: Attempts At Peaceful Protests Are Now "Undemocratic" in Angola press release 
The Congress of South African Trade Unions joins the millions in the length and breadth of our hills and the valleys, the mountains and the glades, the rivers, the deserts, the trees, the flowers, the seas and the ever-changing seasons in the joyous Heritage celebrations anchored on a Theme promoted by the Department of Arts and Culture, ‘Our Indigenous knowledge, our heritage; Towards the identification, promotion and preservation of South Africa's living heritage'. 
COSATU appeals to all citizens to contribute collectively and in their individual capacity to enhance and foster social cohesion with all communities, with respect to their diverse culture and also promote nation building as espoused in the Freedom Charter. 
We wish all persons in the national territory a safe journey for those who will be undertaking short and long trips to visit the families and also going to various faith-based celebrations. 
COSATU urges all traffic authorities and law enforcement agencies to be on the toes to promote road safety on all our roads as many breadwinners are losing lives during the long weekends whilst visiting their families. 
South Africa belongs to all who live in it, black and white! 
Our Heritage is our pride! South Africa
